game.name: Shift Happens
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Play as a down-on-your-luck college student, who just scored a gig to help pay for ramen. You are now a proud employee of Sell-By Grocers! Welcome to the team. Well... I say "team", but in reality, its just you, and your manager, Biff. Stay safe out there!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as a down-on-your-luck college student, who just scored a gig to help pay for ramen. You are now a proud employee of Sell-By Grocers! Welcome to the team. Well... I say "team", but in reality, its just you, and your manager, Biff. Stay safe out there!
